verses.name: 2 Chronicles 25:22
verses.text: And Judah was put to the worse before Israel, and they fled every man to his tent.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 25:23
verses.text: And Joash the king of Israel took Amaziah king of Judah, the son of Joash, the son of Jehoahaz, at Beth–shemesh, and brought him to Jerusalem, and brake down the wall of Jerusalem from the gate of Ephraim to the corner gate, four hundred cubits.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 25:24
verses.text: And he took all the gold and the silver, and all the vessels that were found in the house of God with Obed–edom, and the treasures of the king’s house, the hostages also, and returned to Samaria.
